title: Leaflet Ant Path
description: A Leaflet plugin, to create animated polylines, showing where's the start and end using a small dots flux similar to ants walking in a line. Also available for React.

title: Webpack Chrome Extension Reloader
description: A Webpack plugin, to help the development of Chrome extensions providing a hot-reloader server.

title: Find a Bike
description: A Progressive Web App to help users of shareable bikes find bike stations based on the current location.
